title: Which champion quote from LoL is your favorite delivered line?
body:
It doesn't have to do anything with the actual quote, just the delivery of its voice actor. Here are some of mine, to provide an example:

>Mecha Zero {{champion:14}}: (When buying Mercury's Treads)
"[I REQUIRE NO FURTHER UPGRADES. But I just love these boots.](http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d6/SionMechaZero.itemMercurysTreads01.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20160324235715)"


>{{champion:268}} : "[We walk a path of radiance.](http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/1/14/Azir.move17.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20140827014819)"

Here's a bit of context. I'm an aspiring voice actor, and while I may not be as good as I dream to be, I know a great deal about voicing, and League has some of the most memorable voice actors. Some of these lines are delivered beautifully, and I wanted everybody to share what beauty they found in the hard work of League's voice actors, and how it resonates within them.

replies.body: {{champion:41}}  : ["You will never have a grave, Graves... see, it's 'cause your name, it's... your name is like a grave, it's - I - never mind."](http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/2/2a/Gangplank.tauntGraves02.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20150803063545)

Amg, I didn't even know he said that! I love it! xD

It's doubly sad because I have like 120k mastery on GP. xD

{{champion:136}} : Boop. Boop. Boop.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=69NsyKShfCk
Boop.
Boop.
Boop?
Boop!
Booooop!
Boop?
Boop.

I love this.  When the VO video went out, one of the engineers I work with said that he listened to the whole video, because it was awesome.  Then he said "I just have one question.  What's boop for?".  I replied, "You're going to love it.  It's for when the passive stars hit you."  He smiled very big when I said that.

I just love how much she enjoys her own joke.

Kind of like me...

{{champion:111}} SOOOOOOOOOOOOOMMMMMMMMMMMMMEEEEEEEEEEEEEETTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTIIIIIIIIIIIIMMMMMMMMMMMEEEEEEEEEEEEEESSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS THIIIIIIIIIIIIIIISSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAANNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNCCCCCCCCCCCCCHHHHHHHHHHHHHOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR JUUUUUUUUUUUUSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT WEEEEEEEEEEEIIIIIIIIIIIIIGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHHHHSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS MEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE DOOOOOOOOOOOWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN.

DUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH DUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH DOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

Lamb's [laugh ](http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/2/2b/Kindred.laugh01.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20150916182706)gives me life.

And yes, that is ironic.

{{champion:202}} 
"I envy silence...... because... I must be loud."
"I swear each performance is the last, but I lie every time."

I just love his personality and raw emotion when he says these lines. You can feel the pain and ecstasy he feels when he reflects on his obsession over killing -- an addiction that consumes him. Gives me chills sometimes. Hope this inspires you. :)

"Ready to reap" in mecha {{champion:121}}.

Can also be heard as "ready to rape" tho....
{{champion:121}} "[I have evolved beyond jokes. I am now a robot. Beep. Boop.](http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/3/32/MechaKhazix.joke.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20121119065612)"

{{champion:29}} ITS MEE!!!! I WAS HIDING~~ :3c

also pretty much everything diana says
{{champion:203}} "Tomorow is a hope, never a promise"
If youre looking for quality voice acting go to anime, not LoL.
I mean, anime is huge. That's like saying, "if you're looking for epic battles between people, go to movies."
{{champion:202}} "FOUR!"

{{champion:202}} *Staring intensely at five health bars*
{{item:3512}} *Spawns voidling*
{{champion:202}} "Now, how am I supposed to do this...?"
{{champion:35}} *Auto attacks portal once and leaves*
{{champion:202}} "Thank you, masked madman!"

Ohhhh boy, a quote tread :D


{{champion:201}} : Goats are smart, eat everything, climb everything! and if something kicks you? **kick it back!**

{{champion:201}} : The heart is the strongest muscle

{{champion:201}} (to a [poro)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5dvYxkyQFZU) : next time, you get my back :D  

{{champion:245}} :People waste a lot of time, then they wish for more, more hours in their days, more days in their years, more years in their lives, cause if they had all that extra time, they could fix any mistake.
I don't need hours days or years, I only need [**Seconds**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FtEpp9lkfxA)

{{champion:223}} :The worlds one river, and I'm its [King](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u9RM4HwwoKs), ain't no place I ain't been, ain't no place I can't go again.

Absolutely anything Blood Lord {{champion:8}} says.

Mostly anything Aurelion Sol says, but this in particular;

{{champion:136}}: "A snow globe. Perfect for my collect - to destroy you. Destroy you!" (upon buying {{item:3112}} )

{{champion:110}}: "When you dance with death, _lead_."

{{champion:420}}: "I value truth, and barbecue."

Mecha Zero {{champion:14}}: "**MAXIMUM VELOCITY!**"

Amongst many others. League has real talent in it's VA, especially as of late.
{{champion:29}} "Tresspassers will be shot! Then looted! Then... CHEWED on for a while!
{{champion:29}} "[I hear you're trash! Bow before your king!](http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/8/8b/Twitch.taunt04.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20140404225226)"
Wolf's "So he would always have a friend" line. It just hits like when my younger siblings would fill in the end of thier favorite stories. It's so perfectly earnest.

{{champion:61}} "I know, what makes them tick. I know how, to make the ticking stop."

(Forgive me for the commas, there's no punctuation that can properly illustrate the way she pauses during that line)

{{champion:267}} "Sometimes you're the catch; sometimes you're the bait!"

Life of a squishy support, depending on the enemies crit chance.

Mecha Zero {{champion:14}} (When fully backed to the shop)

"Greetings. I would like to purchase items with human currency."

Mecha Zero {{champion:14}} (When ulting)

"MAXIMUM VELOCITYYYYYY!!!!" and "WHO NEEDS BREAKS?!"

Super Galaxy {{champion:68}} (A random micro VO)

"I don't know how to be afraid!"

Bro{{champion:2}} (Upon dying)

"Aaghh! Yur mom!"

Mecha Zero {{champion:14}}  (Ult)
ALL ABOOOOARD THE HYPE TRAIN

{{champion:202}} "They're going to live..until they die"

Jhin exist.

{{champion:107}} You have a warrior's heart... I think I'll take it!

The few time I actually play Rengar, it's for that quote.

{{champion:75}} Any line he delivers is enough to make a chill go down my spine.


''Your legacy shall drift away; Blown into eternity, like the sands of the desert.''

''Eons... Pass like days.''
{{champion:202}} "*humming*"

Lamb: *"All things, great and small..."*
Wolf: *"... **die.**"*

So chilling.

All of Aurelion's lines.
This one is my favorite
"Cosmic Dragon 5, everyone else 0.  Please take notes"

{{champion:268}}: "Soon, none will question us." [I know this isn't a delivered line, but I love this one. The emotion in his voice is really well-done.]
"Shurima! Your emperor has returned." [This is so inspirational to me, I don't know why though.]
{{champion:91}}: "Have you anything to offer but weakness?!" and "The worst part about losing a blade is to trace back all my stabbings!" [He just sounds so exasperated it's hilarious.]
Pretty much most of Illaoi's lines.
all of ahri's lines in japanese voice.

{{champion:203}} Lamb: "How does hunger feel?"
            Wolf: "Always fair."

{{champion:103}} "Should I make your pulse rise, or... STOP! he he"

{{champion:1}} "I'm rubber and you're... ON FIRE!"

{{champion:136}} "Boop, boop, boop" “Wherever I am is the fashionable part of the universe, even here.”

{{champion:51}} "Want another shot? I wouldn't want to leave things up in the air."

{{champion:245}} "It's not about how much time you have, it's how you use it"

{{champion:222}} "I'm crazy! Got a doctors note..." "Duck! Just kidding, that wont help."

{{champion:43}} (old karma) "Guess what's about to hit the fan"

{{champion:55}} "If you run... you wont see me STAB you!"

{{champion:203}} Pretty much everything they say....

{{champion:7}} "For my next trick, I'll make their life bars disappear." 

{{champion:99}} "Shhhhhhhhh... I'm charging my laser!" 

{{champion:15}} "You cant take it with you, so give it to me."

{{champion:45}} (Final Boss) "Run run! Or you'll be well done!" (Kefka for the win)

{{champion:254}} "Why cant I get a straight answer? It's always just 'Oh no! Stop hitting me! Ow, my face!'"

{{champion:157}} "Death is like the wind. Always by my side." (pretty much any character voiced by Liam O'Brien has good quotes in my book)

{{champion:202}} Most all of his lines....

Literally anything that comes out of jhins mouth.

"I envy silence, because I must be loud."

"Agony. Ecstasy. Peace. Every passing has a beauty of its own."

Just the way it's delivered so chillingly callous is amazing.

{{champion:14}}: COWAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARDS
MZ {{champion:14}} CHOO CHOO
{{champion:11}}  "A true master is an eternal student."
